mapper.select: /* selectMediaChrgReBuildDate */ SELECT a.STATS_DTTM FROM ( SELECT 'MOB_MEDIA_SCRIPT_STATS'G, STATS_DTTM, PLTFOM_TP_CODE, ADVRTS_PRDT_CODE, ADVRTS_TP_CODE, MEDIA_SCRIPT_NO, ITL_TP_CODE, MEDIA_TP_CODE, MEDIA_ID , SUM(TOT_EPRS_CNT)TOT_EPRS_CNT, SUM(PAR_EPRS_CNT)PAR_EPRS_CNT, SUM(CLICK_CNT)CLICK_CNT, SUM(ADVRTS_AMT)ADVRTS_AMT, SUM(MEDIA_PYMNT_AMT)MEDIA_PYMNT_AMT , SUM(TRGT_EPRS_CNT)TRGT_EPRS_CNT, SUM(TRGT_PAR_EPRS_CNT)TRGT_PAR_EPRS_CNT, SUM(TRGT_CLICK_CNT)TRGT_CLICK_CNT, SUM(TRGT_ADVRTS_AMT)TRGT_ADVRTS_AMT FROM BILLING.MOB_MEDIA_SCRIPT_STATS a JOIN dreamsearch.media_script b ON a.MEDIA_SCRIPT_NO = b.NO WHERE b.EPRS_REST_RATE=100 AND STATS_DTTM BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL -10 DAY), '%Y%m%d') AND DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL -1 DAY), '%Y%m%d') GROUP BY STATS_DTTM )a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT 'MOB_MEDIA_SCRIPT_CHRG_STATS'G, STATS_DTTM, PLTFOM_TP_CODE, ADVRTS_PRDT_CODE, ADVRTS_TP_CODE, MEDIA_SCRIPT_NO, ITL_TP_CODE, MEDIA_TP_CODE, MEDIA_ID , SUM(TOT_EPRS_CNT)TOT_EPRS_CNT, SUM(PAR_EPRS_CNT)PAR_EPRS_CNT, SUM(CLICK_CNT)CLICK_CNT, SUM(ADVRTS_AMT)ADVRTS_AMT, SUM(MEDIA_PYMNT_AMT)MEDIA_PYMNT_AMT , SUM(TRGT_EPRS_CNT)TRGT_EPRS_CNT, SUM(TRGT_PAR_EPRS_CNT)TRGT_PAR_EPRS_CNT, SUM(TRGT_CLICK_CNT)TRGT_CLICK_CNT, SUM(TRGT_ADVRTS_AMT)TRGT_ADVRTS_AMT FROM BILLING.MOB_MEDIA_SCRIPT_CHRG_STATS a JOIN dreamsearch.media_script b ON a.MEDIA_SCRIPT_NO = b.NO WHERE b.EPRS_REST_RATE=100 AND STATS_DTTM BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL -10 DAY), '%Y%m%d') AND DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL -1 DAY), '%Y%m%d') GROUP BY STATS_DTTM )b ON a.STATS_DTTM=b.STATS_DTTM AND b.PLTFOM_TP_CODE=b.PLTFOM_TP_CODE AND a.ADVRTS_PRDT_CODE=b.ADVRTS_PRDT_CODE AND a.ADVRTS_TP_CODE=b.ADVRTS_TP_CODE AND a.MEDIA_SCRIPT_NO=b.MEDIA_SCRIPT_NO AND a.ITL_TP_CODE=b.ITL_TP_CODE AND a.MEDIA_TP_CODE=b.MEDIA_TP_CODE AND a.MEDIA_ID=b.MEDIA_ID WHERE (a.TOT_EPRS_CNT!=b.TOT_EPRS_CNT OR a.PAR_EPRS_CNT!=b.PAR_EPRS_CNT OR a.CLICK_CNT!=b.CLICK_CNT ) GROUP BY a.STATS_DTTM;
mapper.update: /* updateMediaChrgStep1 : updateMediaChrgStep1 */ INSERT INTO BILLING.MOB_MEDIA_SCRIPT_CHRG_STATS( STATS_DTTM, PLTFOM_TP_CODE, ADVRTS_PRDT_CODE, ADVRTS_TP_CODE, MEDIA_SCRIPT_NO, ITL_TP_CODE, MEDIA_TP_CODE, MEDIA_ID , TOT_EPRS_CNT, PAR_EPRS_CNT, CLICK_CNT, ADVRTS_AMT, MEDIA_PYMNT_AMT , TRGT_EPRS_CNT, TRGT_PAR_EPRS_CNT, TRGT_CLICK_CNT, TRGT_ADVRTS_AMT ) SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.STATS_DTTM, a.PLTFOM_TP_CODE, a.ADVRTS_PRDT_CODE, a.ADVRTS_TP_CODE, a.MEDIA_SCRIPT_NO, a.ITL_TP_CODE, a.MEDIA_TP_CODE, a.MEDIA_ID , SUM(a.TOT_EPRS_CNT)TOT_EPRS_CNT, SUM(a.PAR_EPRS_CNT)PAR_EPRS_CNT, SUM(a.CLICK_CNT)CLICK_CNT , SUM(a.ADVRTS_AMT)ADVRTS_AMT, SUM(a.MEDIA_PYMNT_AMT)MEDIA_PYMNT_AMT , SUM(a.TRGT_EPRS_CNT)TRGT_EPRS_CNT, SUM(a.TRGT_PAR_EPRS_CNT)TRGT_PAR_EPRS_CNT, SUM(a.TRGT_CLICK_CNT)TRGT_CLICK_CNT, SUM(a.TRGT_ADVRTS_AMT)TRGT_ADVRTS_AMT FROM ( SELECT 'MOB_MEDIA_SCRIPT_STATS'G, STATS_DTTM, PLTFOM_TP_CODE, ADVRTS_PRDT_CODE, ADVRTS_TP_CODE, MEDIA_SCRIPT_NO, ITL_TP_CODE, MEDIA_TP_CODE, MEDIA_ID , SUM(TOT_EPRS_CNT)TOT_EPRS_CNT, SUM(PAR_EPRS_CNT)PAR_EPRS_CNT, SUM(CLICK_CNT)CLICK_CNT, SUM(ADVRTS_AMT)ADVRTS_AMT, SUM(MEDIA_PYMNT_AMT)MEDIA_PYMNT_AMT , SUM(TRGT_EPRS_CNT)TRGT_EPRS_CNT, SUM(TRGT_PAR_EPRS_CNT)TRGT_PAR_EPRS_CNT, SUM(TRGT_CLICK_CNT)TRGT_CLICK_CNT, SUM(TRGT_ADVRTS_AMT)TRGT_ADVRTS_AMT FROM BILLING.MOB_MEDIA_SCRIPT_STATS a JOIN dreamsearch.media_script b ON a.MEDIA_SCRIPT_NO = b.NO WHERE b.EPRS_REST_RATE=100 AND STATS_DTTM = ${STATS_DTTM} GROUP BY STATS_DTTM, PLTFOM_TP_CODE, ADVRTS_PRDT_CODE, ADVRTS_TP_CODE, MEDIA_SCRIPT_NO, ITL_TP_CODE, MEDIA_TP_CODE, MEDIA_ID )a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT 'MOB_MEDIA_SCRIPT_CHRG_STATS'G, STATS_DTTM, PLTFOM_TP_CODE, ADVRTS_PRDT_CODE, ADVRTS_TP_CODE, MEDIA_SCRIPT_NO, ITL_TP_CODE, MEDIA_TP_CODE, MEDIA_ID , SUM(TOT_EPRS_CNT)TOT_EPRS_CNT, SUM(PAR_EPRS_CNT)PAR_EPRS_CNT, SUM(CLICK_CNT)CLICK_CNT, SUM(ADVRTS_AMT)ADVRTS_AMT, SUM(MEDIA_PYMNT_AMT)MEDIA_PYMNT_AMT , SUM(TRGT_EPRS_CNT)TRGT_EPRS_CNT, SUM(TRGT_PAR_EPRS_CNT)TRGT_PAR_EPRS_CNT, SUM(TRGT_CLICK_CNT)TRGT_CLICK_CNT, SUM(TRGT_ADVRTS_AMT)TRGT_ADVRTS_AMT FROM BILLING.MOB_MEDIA_SCRIPT_CHRG_STATS a JOIN dreamsearch.media_script b ON a.MEDIA_SCRIPT_NO = b.NO WHERE b.EPRS_REST_RATE=100 AND STATS_DTTM = ${STATS_DTTM} GROUP BY STATS_DTTM, PLTFOM_TP_CODE, ADVRTS_PRDT_CODE, ADVRTS_TP_CODE, MEDIA_SCRIPT_NO, ITL_TP_CODE, MEDIA_TP_CODE, MEDIA_ID )b ON a.STATS_DTTM=b.STATS_DTTM AND b.PLTFOM_TP_CODE=b.PLTFOM_TP_CODE AND a.ADVRTS_PRDT_CODE=b.ADVRTS_PRDT_CODE AND a.ADVRTS_TP_CODE=b.ADVRTS_TP_CODE AND a.MEDIA_SCRIPT_NO=b.MEDIA_SCRIPT_NO AND a.ITL_TP_CODE=b.ITL_TP_CODE AND a.MEDIA_TP_CODE=b.MEDIA_TP_CODE AND a.MEDIA_ID=b.MEDIA_ID WHERE (a.TOT_EPRS_CNT!=b.TOT_EPRS_CNT OR a.PAR_EPRS_CNT!=b.PAR_EPRS_CNT OR a.CLICK_CNT!=b.CLICK_CNT OR a.ADVRTS_AMT!=b.ADVRTS_AMT ) GROUP BY a.STATS_DTTM, a.PLTFOM_TP_CODE, a.ADVRTS_PRDT_CODE, a.ADVRTS_TP_CODE, a.MEDIA_SCRIPT_NO, a.ITL_TP_CODE, a.MEDIA_TP_CODE, a.MEDIA_ID )a ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE TOT_EPRS_CNT = a.TOT_EPRS_CNT, PAR_EPRS_CNT=a.PAR_EPRS_CNT, CLICK_CNT=a.CLICK_CNT , ADVRTS_AMT=a.ADVRTS_AMT, MEDIA_PYMNT_AMT=a.MEDIA_PYMNT_AMT , TRGT_EPRS_CNT=a.TRGT_EPRS_CNT, TRGT_PAR_EPRS_CNT=a.TRGT_PAR_EPRS_CNT, TRGT_CLICK_CNT=a.TRGT_CLICK_CNT, TRGT_ADVRTS_AMT=a.TRGT_ADVRTS_AMT , ALT_USER_ID ='BATCH' , ALT_DTTM = NOW();

/* updateMediaChrgStep2 : updateMediaChrgStep2 */ INSERT INTO BILLING.MOB_MEDIA_CHRG_STATS( STATS_DTTM, PLTFOM_TP_CODE, ADVRTS_PRDT_CODE, ADVRTS_TP_CODE, MEDIA_ID, ITL_TP_CODE , TOT_EPRS_CNT, PAR_EPRS_CNT, CLICK_CNT, ADVRTS_AMT, MEDIA_PYMNT_AMT , TRGT_EPRS_CNT, TRGT_PAR_EPRS_CNT, TRGT_CLICK_CNT, TRGT_ADVRTS_AMT , REG_USER_ID, REG_DTTM, ALT_USER_ID, ALT_DTTM ) SELECT * FROM ( SELECT STATS_DTTM, PLTFOM_TP_CODE, ADVRTS_PRDT_CODE, ADVRTS_TP_CODE, MEDIA_ID, ITL_TP_CODE , SUM(TOT_EPRS_CNT)TOT_EPRS_CNT, SUM(PAR_EPRS_CNT)PAR_EPRS_CNT, SUM(CLICK_CNT)CLICK_CNT, SUM(ADVRTS_AMT)ADVRTS_AMT, SUM(MEDIA_PYMNT_AMT)MEDIA_PYMNT_AMT , SUM(TRGT_EPRS_CNT)TRGT_EPRS_CNT, SUM(TRGT_PAR_EPRS_CNT)TRGT_PAR_EPRS_CNT, SUM(TRGT_CLICK_CNT)TRGT_CLICK_CNT, SUM(TRGT_ADVRTS_AMT)TRGT_ADVRTS_AMT , REG_USER_ID, REG_DTTM, ALT_USER_ID, ALT_DTTM FROM BILLING.MOB_MEDIA_SCRIPT_CHRG_STATS WHERE STATS_DTTM = ${STATS_DTTM} GROUP BY STATS_DTTM, PLTFOM_TP_CODE, ADVRTS_PRDT_CODE, ADVRTS_TP_CODE, MEDIA_ID, ITL_TP_CODE
) S ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE MOB_MEDIA_CHRG_STATS.TOT_EPRS_CNT = S.TOT_EPRS_CNT , MOB_MEDIA_CHRG_STATS.PAR_EPRS_CNT = S.PAR_EPRS_CNT , MOB_MEDIA_CHRG_STATS.CLICK_CNT = S.CLICK_CNT , MOB_MEDIA_CHRG_STATS.ADVRTS_AMT = S.ADVRTS_AMT , MOB_MEDIA_CHRG_STATS.MEDIA_PYMNT_AMT = S.MEDIA_PYMNT_AMT , MOB_MEDIA_CHRG_STATS.TRGT_EPRS_CNT = S.TRGT_EPRS_CNT , MOB_MEDIA_CHRG_STATS.TRGT_PAR_EPRS_CNT = S.TRGT_PAR_EPRS_CNT , MOB_MEDIA_CHRG_STATS.TRGT_CLICK_CNT = S.TRGT_CLICK_CNT , MOB_MEDIA_CHRG_STATS.TRGT_ADVRTS_AMT = S.TRGT_ADVRTS_AMT , MOB_MEDIA_CHRG_STATS.ALT_USER_ID ='BATCH' , MOB_MEDIA_CHRG_STATS.ALT_DTTM = NOW();
